MS.S: DSC resources for managing certificates on a Windows Server.

## [5.1.0] - 2021-02-26_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- PfxImport:_x000D__x000A_ - Added Base64Content parameter to specify the content of a PFX file that can_x000D__x000A_ be included in the configuration MOF - Fixes [Issue #241](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/241)._x000D__x000A_- CertificateImport:_x000D__x000A_ - Added Base64Content parameter to specify the content of a certificate file_x000D__x000A_ that can be included in the configuration MOF - Fixes [Issue #241](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/241)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fix bug where `Import-PfxCertificateEx` would not install private keys in the_x000D__x000A_ ALLUSERSPROFILE path when importing to LocalMachine store. [Issue #248](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/248)._x000D__x000A_- Renamed `master` branch to `main` - Fixes [Issue #237](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/237)._x000D__x000A_- Updated `GitVersion.yml` to latest pattern - Fixes [Issue #245](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/245)._x000D__x000A_- Changed `Test-Thumbprint` to cache supported hash algorithms to increase_x000D__x000A_ performance - Fixes [Issue #221](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/221)._x000D__x000A_- Added warning messages into empty catch blocks in `Certificate.PDT` module to_x000D__x000A_ assist with debugging._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Removed requirement for tests to use `New-SelfSignedCertificateEx` from_x000D__x000A_ [TechNet Gallery due to retirement](https://docs.microsoft.com/teamblog/technet-gallery-retirement)._x000D__x000A_ This will prevent tests from running on Windows Server 2012 R2 - Fixes [Issue #250](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/250)._x000D__x000A_- Fixed FIPS support when used in versions of PowerShell Core 6 & PowerShell 7._x000D__x000A_- Moved thumbprint generation for testing into helper function `New-CertificateThumbprint`_x000D__x000A_ and fixed tests for validating FIPS thumbprints in `Test-Thumbprint` so that it_x000D__x000A_ runs on PowerShell Core/7.x.

DSC resources for managing certificates on a Windows Server.

## [5.1.0] - 2021-02-26_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Added_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- PfxImport:_x000D__x000A_ - Added Base64Content parameter to specify the content of a PFX file that can_x000D__x000A_ be included in the configuration MOF - Fixes [Issue #241](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/241)._x000D__x000A_- CertificateImport:_x000D__x000A_ - Added Base64Content parameter to specify the content of a certificate file_x000D__x000A_ that can be included in the configuration MOF - Fixes [Issue #241](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/241)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fix bug where `Import-PfxCertificateEx` would not install private keys in the_x000D__x000A_ ALLUSERSPROFILE path when importing to LocalMachine store. [Issue #248](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/248)._x000D__x000A_- Renamed `master` branch to `main` - Fixes [Issue #237](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/237)._x000D__x000A_- Updated `GitVersion.yml` to latest pattern - Fixes [Issue #245](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/245)._x000D__x000A_- Changed `Test-Thumbprint` to cache supported hash algorithms to increase_x000D__x000A_ performance - Fixes [Issue #221](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/221)._x000D__x000A_- Added warning messages into empty catch blocks in `Certificate.PDT` module to_x000D__x000A_ assist with debugging._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Removed requirement for tests to use `New-SelfSignedCertificateEx` from_x000D__x000A_ [TechNet Gallery due to retirement](https://docs.microsoft.com/teamblog/technet-gallery-retirement)._x000D__x000A_ This will prevent tests from running on Windows Server 2012 R2 - Fixes [Issue #250](https://github.com/dsccommunity/CertificateDsc/issues/250)._x000D__x000A_- Fixed FIPS support when used in versions of PowerShell Core 6 & PowerShell 7._x000D__x000A_- Moved thumbprint generation for testing into helper function `New-CertificateThumbprint`_x000D__x000A_ and fixed tests for validating FIPS thumbprints in `Test-Thumbprint` so that it_x000D__x000A_ runs on PowerShell Core/7.x.
